title: Nature of matter: an atomic view
creator_credit: Steven Katten and C R M Production
brief_description: Visits Dr Erwin Meuller Laboratory Pennsylvania State University to demonstrate the field-ion microscope. Discusses wave particle duality and spectroscopy. Photographed by Isidore Mankofsky with music composed by Fred Karlin.
creator_credit_for_label: Steven Katten and C R M Production
